definition: finger/to point at or to/to indicate or refer to/to depend on/to count on/(of hair) to stand on end
to transmit/to lead/to guide/to conduct/to direct

sentences.english: The students and the instructor go out driving for blocks of two hours.
sentences.chinese: 指導員與學生出去練兩個小時。

sentences.english: Cao Zheng waiting to militia, stop von instructor Zhang Bingfei trial.
sentences.chinese: 曹政等人前往民兵連，阻止馮指導員審訊張秉飛。

sentences.english: Some close-ups of cadets and instructors.
sentences.chinese: 以下是學員和指導員的特寫鏡頭。

sentences.english: Of course, if troops had no food, a political director would speak empty words.
sentences.chinese: 如果戰士沒有飯喫，政治指導員當然只能是說空話。

sentences.english: Everyone looked to the political instructor to say something.
sentences.chinese: 大家都指望菩政治指導員能講幾句話。

sentences.english: Seaman began taking classes anywhere she could find them and is now even part of a polymer clay guild.
sentences.chinese: 希曼開始四處聽課，還成了一個軟陶班的指導員。

sentences.english: Please tell the Foremen keep the vessel level during loading.
sentences.chinese: 告訴單船指導員裝貨時候保持船體平衡。

sentences.english: Fishery officials have started sending instructors to schools.
sentences.chinese: 漁業官員已經開始委派指導員到學校。

sentences.english: Therefore, community sports instructors work in the formation of good quality will.
sentences.chinese: 因此，社會體育指導員在工作中良好意志品質的形成。

sentences.english: The instructor demonstrates how to belay and safety knots used.
sentences.chinese: 指導員蔣示範如何把繩索拴在繫繩索和系安全扣等。

sentences.english: More tech-savvy mentors working with me on it.
sentences.chinese: 更精通技術指導員的工作與我談。

sentences.english: Sam used to be a river raft guy, a river rafting guide, so we would go do that.
sentences.chinese: 薩姆以前是漂流隊的指導員，所以我們可以玩那個。

sentences.english: To complete the task after Du Xueyan returned to the women's resistance, even the instructor.
sentences.chinese: 完成任務後杜雪顏回到抗聯，任女子連指導員。

sentences.english: What apparently happened was that the Kwangsi Clique found the cost of British aircraft and instructors too high.
sentences.chinese: 顯然桂系覺得英國飛機和指導員成本太高。

sentences.english: Careers officers offer impartial advice to all pupils.
sentences.chinese: 就業指導員向所有學生提供公正無私的建議。

sentences.english: The nighthawk is anti-japan union calls a instructor cosmos sulphureus.
sentences.chinese: “夜鷹”便是抗聯一團指導員黃秋英。
